body: I'm not sure why, but this CircleCI ran the job for this PR under @relud's repo, and it failed. I can't really do anything about that. Relud, can you check if you have web hooks on your fork of normandy, and if so, remove them and re-push to this branch? (force pushing an "amended" commit will work well)
